snippet.title: Just Us Alpha - Steam Store Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Alpha gameplay footage from my upcoming title "Just Us", which is a 2 player COOP multiplayer survival game. 
Steam Store is Live: http://store.steampowered.com/app/612660

Website for more information:
http://www.justusgame.com

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/dryeeldev

Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/justusgame

If you want to support my development of Just Us, please check out my game "The Simple Apocalypse"
 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/693430/The_Simple_Apocalypse/
